dmca.title: DMCA Infringement
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Eric Thompson [mailto:zaroff@gmail.com] 
Posted At: Sunday, June 25, 2006 11:41 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: DMCA Infringement
Subject: DMCA Infringement


 
This user was hosted at EV1, was shut down via DMCA, and has now moved
to your services. Below is the DMCA form for EV1, let me know if you
need this in a different format.
I can fax a signed form of this as well.
 
 

1. A physical or electronic signature of a person authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

 

Eric Ray Thompson

 

2. Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been
infringed, or, if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are
covered by a single notification, a representative list of such works at
that site. 

 

http://www.msnheaven. com <http://www.msnheaven.com> 

http://www.msnheaven. com/dmca/MSNHeaven.com/
<http://www.msnheaven.com/dmca/MSNHeaven.com/>
<http://www.msnheaven.com/dmca/msnheaven.com/> 

 

3. Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing or to
be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or
access to which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient
to permit Ev1servers to locate the material. 

 

Design, layout, database records, all subsequent text on pages found in
the website http://www.msnvalue.com <http://www.msnvalue.com/> 

 

The original site that was sold Sept 2005 is located at
http://www.msnheaven.com <http://www.msnheaven.com/> . I have modified
the site from what I purchased. The site as it was sold can be found at
http://www.msnheaven.com /dmca/MSNHeaven.com/
<http://www.msnheaven.com/dmca/MSNHeaven.com/>  most sub pages do not
work, but if required I could make them available.

 

The site was sold as a complete site, with no rights for re-sale left
with the seller.

 

Original Sale Thread:
http://forums.digitalpoint.com/showthread.php?t=28768
<http://forums.digitalpoint.com/showthread.php?t=28768> 

Current Sale Thread:
http://forums.digitalpoint.com/showthread.php?t=81257
<http://forums.digitalpoint.com/showthread.php?t=81257> 

I am Digital747 (Eric Thompson

HoT CoFFe is hotimpression007@hotmail.com
<mailto:hotimpression007@hotmail.com> 

 

4. Information reasonably sufficient to permit Ev1servers to contact the
complaining party, such as an address, telephone number, and, if
available, an electronic mail address at which the complaining party may
be contacted. 

 

Seller of the original site:
Naveed Yousaf

hotimpression007@hotmail. com <mailto:hotimpression007@hotmail.com> 

hosted at: 209.85.32.12 <http://209.85.32.12/> 

 

Registrant:

Muhmmad, Bilal

hotimpression007@hotmail. com <mailto:hotimpression007@hotmail.com>  /
info@lhrhost.com <mailto:info@lhrhost.com>  

Block-5 Defence Housing Society

Lahore, PUNJAB 45840 

PK

+92(300)431-6671

 

 

5.  A statement that the complaining party has a good faith belief that
use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the
copyright owner, it's agent, or the law. 

 

The complete website was sold. No re-sale rights were left with the
seller.

 

6.  A statement that the information in the notification is accurate,
and under penalty of perjury, that the complaining party is authorized
to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly
infringed. 

 

I assure that the above information is accurate.

 

 

Eric Thompson

Binary Inertia

439 Elmdale Ave

Ottumwa, IA 52501

515-708-3683
